description: Fitness record for the project. Documents what was built, key decisions and their reasoning, what was learned, and what carries forward.

required: What Was Built — concrete outcomes achieved
Key Decisions — choices made and their reasoning
What We Learned — insights from the work
optional: Changes Outside This Project — side effects
Carry Forward — items for future projects

content: Natural language. Honest assessment. Decisions should explain the why, not just the what. Learnings should be transferable.
